events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event emitted for setting the modelValue

props.name: color
props.description: The color variant of the radio

props.name: disabled
props.description: The disabled state of the radio

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: The indeterminate state of the radio

props.name: value
props.description: Used to set the radio value when used inside a radio group

props.name: modelValue
props.description: Used to set the radio value when used by itself

props.name: name
props.description: The unique identifier of the radio

props.name: native
props.description: Displays the native browser radio input indicator

props.name: readonly
props.description: The readonly state of the radio

props.name: size
props.description: The size variant of the radio

styles.name: font-size
styles.description: The font size of the radio component label

styles.name: margin-right
styles.description: The right margin of the radio component, when displaying multiple inline radioes

styles.name: indicator-border-width
styles.description: The border width of the radio component indicator

styles.name: indicator-size
styles.description: The size of the radio component indicator

styles.name: indicator-icon-size
styles.description: The size of the radio component indicator icon

styles.name: indicator-margin-right
styles.description: The right margin of the radio component indicator

styles.name: color
styles.description: The label color of the radio component

styles.name: color-disabled
styles.description: The label color of the radio component when disabled

styles.name: indicator-background
styles.description: The background of the radio component indicator

styles.name: indicator-background-checked
styles.description: The background of the radio component indicator when checked

styles.name: indicator-background-disabled
styles.description: The background of the radio component indicator when disabled

styles.name: indicator-background-checked-disabled
styles.description: The background of the radio component indicator when checked and disabled

styles.name: indicator-border-color
styles.description: The border-color of the radio component indicator

styles.name: indicator-border-color-checked
styles.description: The border-color of the radio component indicator when checked

styles.name: indicator-border-color-disabled
styles.description: The border-color of the radio component indicator when disabled

styles.name: indicator-border-color-checked-disabled
styles.description: The border-color of the radio component indicator when checked and disabled

styles.name: indicator-icon-color
styles.description: The color of the radio component indicator icon

styles.name: indicator-icon-color-disabled
styles.description: The color of the checkbox component indicator icon when disabled
